question: Nai-kuan ê portfolio strategy ū siáⁿ-chióng Calmar ratio ê phòe-tōaⁿ phiah-chhōa chòe-tōa ê phòe-lu̍t tōa-chi̍h?
Tong jiok suan khah tuā ê Sharpe ratio tsuan-kuaⁿ ê kui-tsū, uí-tsū suan kui-tsū tsuan-kuaⁿ ê sóo-ū bô-sī ki-tshú ê hong-lüeh ê tsuan-kuaⁿ ê tsua̍h-tsóng hō͘-ka? (Tsóng-kui-tsū: 147.91%)
Tùi Portfolio Strategy lāi-bīn, ū siánn-mih chi̍t ê hāng-ba̍k ê Sharpe ratio ê thê-ka tē-2 koân, chhiáⁿ kóng i ê Calmar ratio ê tùi-èng thê-ka.
chí-phòan Calmar tỉ-lē pí kiám-ná 15% kah píng-tóan Sharpe tỉ-lē pí tui-lián 35% ê Portfolio Strategy ūi-chāi？

Tī chin-ê lán-ê koan-î 393 ê chiàⁿ-siong thêng-sū tiong, ài chó-iūⁿ chē chē ê sêng-hun sī AlphaSharpe chiàⁿ-siong hō͘ AlphaSharpe ki-kim tùi 393 ê Calmar chin-chē thêng-sū tùi lán ê ki-kim lâi kóng, chin-chē sêng-hun ki-kim lâi chiàⁿ-siong chin-chē ê Calmar chin-chē sêng-hun ê ki-kim lâi ki-kim ki-kim tùi lán ê ki-kim chin-chē ê Calmar chin-chē ê Calmar ê sêng-hun

Tchut-kè 'Risk Parity' hō͘-chè ê sêng-chiok thè-chha (performance improvement) sī chhiau-kòe 10 pái-phòaⁿ tiám (percentage points) hō͘ nn̄g hāng sò͘-kì, i koh-chài ū su-iú 'Equal Weighted' ê pí-kàu-tiám (baseline) khah hó-kè b?
answer: Ū, i koh-chài sī su-iú khah hó-kè. I ê kái-kòe liáu ê ΔSharpe chiū-sī +28.32% kah i ê kái-kòe liáu ê ΔCalmar chiū-sī +0.36%. In-ūi nn̄g hāng sò͘-tiâu lóng koh-chài tāi-piáu 'Equal Weighted' ê 0.00% pí-kàu-tiám, chiū-sī ū chi̍t ê thè-chha.

question: Chiu ê su-kù ū thê-kiong sìn-tòe ê liân-sòaⁿ koan-hē, chi-kan ê Sharpe kap Calmar sòe-piau ê cheng-kim tī só͘-ū hui ki-chún kòe-têng tiong, bô? Chù-kè lí-iû.
answer: Bô, chîn-kù bô thê-kiong sìn-tòe ê liân-sòaⁿ koan-hē. Chóng--sī, 'Risk Parity' kap 'Equal Risk Cont.' lâi kóng, in ū chi̍t ê sio-kāng ê hêng-thài, to̍h sī to̍h chi̍t ê tōa ΔSharpe tòe chi̍t ê sió ΔCalmar, chi̍t ê 'AlphaSharpe' kòe-têng chiah kā chit ê piau-chún phiah-siah. I ū chi̍t ê chin tōa ê ΔCalmar, pí i ê ΔSharpe koh khah chē, chèng-bêng chit nn̄g ê sòe-piau chi-kan ê koan-hē sī hui liân-sòaⁿ, chiâⁿ chē sī oá tī kòe-têng.

question: Tī chia ê piáu lāi-bīn, ū kúi-ê chhiat-lio̍k tī i ê Calmar sū-lē kah i ê Sharpe sū-lē pí, ē-tàng tit-tio̍h koh-khah tōa ê kái-liông?
Tī chha-kòan ê kî-tha kòe-lūi hāng-bo̍k ê sǹg-sū, lán kám-chiap 'AlphaSharpe' chha-khut chāi i ê Sharpe kap Calmar sòaⁿ thiau-chiâⁿ ê pí-hóe, hō͘ i kah pa̍t-ê bô-kâng?
answer: Chiu-sī 'AlphaSharpe' hāng-bo̍k. Tùi 'Risk Parity' kap 'Equal Risk Cont.' lâi kóng, Sharpe sòaⁿ thiau-chiâⁿ ê thiah-chhiâng sī iân-jû Calmar sòaⁿ thiau-chiâⁿ ê 3.7 pōi. Tān-sī 'AlphaSharpe' chha-khut, i ê Calmar thiah-chhiâng (+116.31%) siâⁿ-chòe khah tōa, pí i ê Sharpe thiah-chhiâng (+71.04%) khah tōa, chheⁿ-bêng chāi thiah-chhiâng ê hùn-sù-chiap bô-kāng.

question: Piping 'Risk Parity' kap 'Equal Risk Cont.' ti Strategy, in lai si-keng kán-ná ke kán-ná to̍h khah hó, kap hē ê ki-sûn lâi phó͘ lâi thiau thiau?
answer: 'Equal Risk Cont.' to̍h khah ke ê performance profile. I khah to̍h 'Risk Parity' 0.23% ê Sharpe ratio (+38.55% vs +38.32%) kap 0.08% ê Calmar ratio (+10.44% vs +10.36%).

question: Tī chiat-tâⁿ lāi-bīn, 'Equal Risk Cont.' Portfolio Strategy ê ΔSharpe (%) ê sió-ta̍t sī siáⁿ-mih?
